name: The Monster Gun's Open Alpha
description:
The Monster Gun's Open Alpha ====================================
Open Alpha Version Overview
--------------------------------------------------------
Implemented up to stage 1 boss
There is one type of gecko available
====================================

Version 1.0.1
Fixes for HPBar

It is a 2D gun action game in which you will have an adventure with a gecko.
The stages in this fantasy world are filled with monsters that stand in the way of the player's progress.
The player must work together with Monster in order to restore peace to the world and defeat the Great Demon King.
With just one Monster to fight alongside you, you'll feel like you're fighting with someone else!

Your impressions and opinions about playing with it are welcome.
We hope to continue to brush up on our work, so
Comments are welcome!

This game was planned and created by me alone and was completed in three months!

====================================
How to operate
--------------------------------------------------------
AD or ←→:Move
Z : Jump
X : Shoot the bullets
X + ↑ : Shoot the bullets up
C : A killer shot Menu screen
WASD or ↑←↓→: Move
Space or Z: Determine
X : Cancel
====================================

====================================
Elements to be added
--------------------------------------------------------
Add 6 more Monster's (7 total)
Add up to stage 5
Added level of difficulty
Add Stage Select function
===================================
